body.para: The main menu is displayed either in the top header of the U3Admin web page, or as a sidebar on the left-hand side of the screen. Use Theme & Settings to choose the top or sidebar menu style to your liking.

Menu items are categorised into Menu Groups. Menu groups have a title such as Admin, Course, Participation etc. The menu groups displayed on your menu depend on the access rights provided to you by your system administrator. if you believe you require access to an option you do not see, ask your system administrator to provide you with additional authorisation.

Both menu styles are responsive to changes in your device's screen size. On smaller devices they will, by default be hidden. To activate the menu, click the "hamburger" icon on the top left hand side of the screen.
